zone.title: Availability Zone
zone.tip: Choose the zone in which your volume will reside

multiattachConfiguration.disabledTip:
If you enable Multi-Attach, you can attach the volume to up to 16 instances built on the Nitro System in the same Availability Zone.
*Be supported with io1 and io2 volumes only.

volumeManageAttachment.title: Attach to an instance
volumeManageAttachment.tip: Attaching a disk is like plugging in an additional driver to your instance.
volumeManageAttachment.attachTip: You can only attach this disk to instances in the same region and zone.
volumeManageAttachment.extraTip: You may still need to mount and format your disks using this instace's disk utilities.
volumeManageAttachment.href: Learn more about preparing attached disks for use in Linux/Unix

volumeManageSnapshots.title: Manual snapshots
volumeManageSnapshots.tip: You can create a snapshot to back up your disk.
volumeManageSnapshots.name: Give your snapshots a name.

bucketManagePermissions.title: Bucket access permissions
bucketManagePermissions.tip:
Manage the anonymous access to objects in this bucket.You can make all objects private or public(read-only).
Alternatively, you can keep your bucket private while making individual objects public(read-only).
bucketManagePermissions.infoTip: Your objects are readable only by you or anyone you give access to.
bucketManagePermissions.blockNewACLs: Block public access to buckets and objects granted through new access control lists(ACLs)
bucketManagePermissions.blockAnyACLs: Block public access to buckets and objects granted through any access control lists(ACLs)
bucketManagePermissions.blockNewPublic: Block public access to buckets and objects granted through new public bucket or access point policies
bucketManagePermissions.blockAnyPublic: Block public and cross-account access to buckets and objects granted through any public bucket or access point policies
